author: rubys
msg: Allow the jsp compiler executable to be specified.  Tested with JDK1.2.2
and Jikes on Windows, and IBM JDK1.1.8 and Jikes on Redhat Linux 6.1.

author: rubys
msg: Bring JspUtil up to the latest JSP1.1 spec with respect to XML Request
time attribute expressions (section 7.6.2).  Thanks once again to
Danno Ferrin for bringing this to my attention.

author: rubys
msg: Fix for: Bogus request time attrs accepted.
Danno Ferrin <shemnon@earthlink.net> noted that the code in JspUtil
did not properly ensure that opening and closing expression delimiters
matched.  Also changed the XML delimiters to match the spec.

author: rubys
msg: Defensive programming against bad JDK implementations of URLConnection.

author: mode
msg: Mandatory attribute check. Putting it in the branch code too
